gui.controller

Class CustomerScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.controller.CustomerScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScreenController, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class CustomerScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, IScreenController
    Controller class responsible for managing the UI interactions on the customer screen. Implements the Initializable interface to initialize JavaFX components. Implements the IScreenController interface for screen management.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        Initializes the controller after its root element has been completely processed. This method is invoked by the FXMLLoader when the associated FXML file is loaded. It initializes UI components and hides buttons based on the type of customer.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object.
        resources - The resources used to localize the root object.

      • onBackClicked

        public void onBackClicked()
        Event handler triggered when the "Back" button is clicked. Navigates back to the previous screen or performs logout.

      • onHomeClicked

        public void onHomeClicked()
        Event handler triggered when the "Home" button is clicked. Loads the customer homepage screen.

      • onMakeOrderClicked

        public void onMakeOrderClicked()
        Event handler triggered when the "Make Order" button is clicked. Loads the make order screen.

      • onManageOrdersClicked

        public void onManageOrdersClicked()
        Event handler triggered when the "Manage Orders" button is clicked. Loads the manage orders screen.

      • onLogoutClicked

        public void onLogoutClicked()
        Event handler triggered when the "Logout" button is clicked. Performs logout.
        Specified by:
        onLogoutClicked in interface IScreenController

      • onServerCrashed

        public void onServerCrashed()
        Event handler triggered when the server crashes. Displays a notification to the user and closes the application.
        Specified by:
        onServerCrashed in interface IScreenController

      • onNotificationButtonClicked

        public void onNotificationButtonClicked()
        Event handler triggered when the "Notification" button is clicked. Retrieves notifications for the customer from the server. Displays the notifications to the user.

      • onCloseApplication

        public void onCloseApplication()
        Handles the process of closing the client application. Initiates a logout request to the server and closes the client's connection. This method is typically called when the user intends to exit the application.
        Specified by:
        onCloseApplication in interface IScreenController
